import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder, StandardScaler
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor
from xgboost import XGBRegressor
from lightgbm import LGBMRegressor
from catboost import CatBoostRegressor
from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error, r2_score
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')
validation_df = pd.read_csv('data/validation.csv')

# Separate features and target
X_train = train_df.drop(['Id', 'SalePrice'], axis=1)
y_train = train_df['SalePrice']
X_val = validation_df.drop(['Id', 'SalePrice'], axis=1)
y_val = validation_df['SalePrice']
X_test = test_df.drop(['Id'], axis=1)

# Identify categorical and numerical columns
categorical_columns = X_train.select_dtypes(include=['object']).columns.tolist()
numerical_columns = X_train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns.tolist()

# Feature engineering: create age and area ratios
X_train['Age'] = X_train['YrSold'] - X_train['YearBuilt']
X_train['AgeRemod'] = X_train['YrSold'] - X_train['YearRemodAdd']
X_train['LotAreaPerHouse'] = X_train['LotArea'] / (X_train['1stFlrSF'] + X_train['2ndFlrSF'] + 1)
X_train['GrLivAreaPerBed'] = X_train['GrLivArea'] / (X_train['BedroomAbvGr'] + 1)
X_train['TotalSF'] = X_train['1stFlrSF'] + X_train['2ndFlrSF'] + X_train['LowQualFinSF']
X_train['BsmtSFRatio'] = X_train['TotalBsmtSF'] / (X_train['1stFlrSF'] + 1)

X_val['Age'] = X_val['YrSold'] - X_val['YearBuilt']
X_val['AgeRemod'] = X_val['YrSold'] - X_val['YearRemodAdd']
X_val['LotAreaPerHouse'] = X_val['LotArea'] / (X_val['1stFlrSF'] + X_val['2ndFlrSF'] + 1)
X_val['GrLivAreaPerBed'] = X_val['GrLivArea'] / (X_val['BedroomAbvGr'] + 1)
X_val['TotalSF'] = X_val['1stFlrSF'] + X_val['2ndFlrSF']

numerical_columns = X_train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns.tolist()

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder, StandardScaler
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor
from xgboost import XGBRegressor
from lightgbm import LGBMRegressor
from catboost import CatBoostRegressor
from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error, r2_score
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')
validation_df = pd.read_csv('data/validation.csv')

# Separate features and target
X_train = train_df.drop(['Id', 'SalePrice'], axis=1)
y_train = train_df['SalePrice']
X_val = validation_df.drop(['Id', 'SalePrice'], axis=1)
y_val = validation_df['SalePrice']
X_test = test_df.drop(['Id'], axis=1)

# Identify categorical and numerical columns
categorical_columns = X_train.select_dtypes(include=['object']).columns.tolist()
numerical_columns = X_train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns.tolist()

# Ensure all columns exist before processing
categorical_columns = [col for col in categorical_columns if col in X_train.columns]
numerical_columns = [col for col in numerical_columns if col in X_train.columns]

# Feature engineering: create age and area ratios
for df in [X_train, X_val, X_test]:
    df['Age'] = df['YrSold'] - df['YearBuilt']
    df['AgeRemod'] = df['YrSold'] - df['YearRemodAdd']
    df['LotAreaPerHouse'] = df['LotArea'] / (df['1stFlrSF'] + df['2ndFlrSF'] + 1)
    df['GrLivAreaPerBed'] = df['GrLivArea'] / (df['BedroomAbvGr'] + 1)
    df['TotalSF'] = df['1stFlrSF'] + df['2ndFlrSF'] + df['LowQualFinSF']
    df['BsmtSFRatio'] = df['TotalBsmtSF'] / (df['1stFlrSF'] + 1)

# Fill missing values safely
for col in categorical_columns:
    if col in X_train.columns:
        X_train[col] = X_train[col].fillna(X_train[col].mode()[0])
